–ú–æ—Å—Ç-–∞–≥—Ä–µ–≥–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –≤ MetaMask Portfolio –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –¥–µ—à–µ–≤—ã–µ, –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã–µ –∏ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–æ–≤ –∏–∑ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω–∞ –≤ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–æ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–≤—Å—é–¥—É –∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã–π –º–æ—Å—Ç. –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π—Ç–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é ¬´–ú–æ—Å—Ç¬ª —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏ —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω—ã –∏–∑ –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω–∞ –≤ –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω–∞, –Ω–µ –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥—è –∏–∑ –æ–∫–Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã!

–ú–æ—Å—Ç ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ –∞–≥—Ä–µ–≥–∞—Ç–æ—Ä, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –Ω–∞–ø—Ä—è–º—É—é –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å Socket –∏ LI.FI –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ —Ç—â–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤ –º–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤: Connext, Hop, Celer cBridge –∏ Polygon Bridge. –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –æ–±—à–∏—Ä–Ω–æ–µ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —ç—Ç–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—Å –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –¥–µ—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ, –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –Ω–∞–¥–µ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –º–æ—Å—Ç—ã.

  7. –í—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ ¬´–û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∑–∞–∫—Ü–∏—é¬ª, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–¥–∏—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∑–∞–∫—Ü–∏—é —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –º–æ—Å—Ç –≤ –∫–æ—à–µ–ª—å–∫–µ MetaMask.
  8. –í—ã —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –æ—Ç—Å–ª–µ–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ –Ω–∞ –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏ ¬´–¢–µ–∫—É—â–∞—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–∞—á–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –º–æ—Å—Ç¬ª –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤—ã –≤ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–º –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω–µ.

–§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è ¬´–ú–æ—Å—Ç¬ª –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –æ—Ç –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω–∞ –∫ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–º—É, –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—è —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å web3 –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ—Å–≤—è–∑—å –≤ –Ω–µ–º.

–ü–æ–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ —Ç–æ–º—É, –∫–∞–∫ –∞–≥—Ä–µ–≥–∞—Ç–æ—Ä—ã –∞–≤–∏–∞–±–∏–ª–µ—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç –≤–∞–º –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ —Å–∞–º—ã–π –¥–µ—à–µ–≤—ã–π –∞–≤–∏–∞–±–∏–ª–µ—Ç –∏/–∏–ª–∏ —Å–∞–º—ã–π –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã–π —Ä–µ–π—Å, –º–æ—Å—Ç –≤ MetaMask Portfolio –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ —Å–∞–º—ã–π –¥–µ—à–µ–≤—ã–π –∏/–∏–ª–∏ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã–π –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –≤—ã –∑–Ω–∞–ª–∏, —á—Ç–æ –≤–∞—à–∞ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∫–∞ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤—ã–≥–æ–¥–Ω–æ–π. –í—Å–µ —ç—Ç–æ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –¥–µ—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ (dapp).

–ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –∫ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥—É? –£–∑–Ω–∞–π—Ç–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–µ–µ –Ω–∞ metamask.io/portfolio/

MetaMask Portfolio: –æ—Ç—Å–ª–µ–∂–∏–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–π—Ç–µ –≤—Å–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —É –≤–∞—Å –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤ web3

MetaMask Portfolio –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–æ–±–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å–Ω—É—é –∏ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É –¥–ª—è —É–¥–æ–≤–ª–µ—Ç–≤–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –≤ web3 –∏ –¥–∞–µ—Ç –≤–∞–º –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏—é. –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –≤–æ—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –ü–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å—é —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è–º–∏ ¬´–ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å¬ª, ¬´–°–≤–æ–ø¬ª, ¬´–ú–æ—Å—Ç¬ª –∏ ¬´–°—Ç–µ–π–∫–∏–Ω–≥¬ª. –ú—ã –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞–¥ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ–º —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ dapp –ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏–º—ã—Ö –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π. –ù–∞–∂–º–∏—Ç–µ –∑–¥–µ—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —É–∑–Ω–∞—Ç—å –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –æ MetaMask Portfolio –∏ –µ–≥–æ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è—Ö.

nodes.title: Introducing MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps
nodes.subtitle: A new way to stay safe with community-powered tools.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Safety is paramount in today's digital world ‚Äî especially in web3, where users frequently interact with decentralized applications and manage valuable assets. A common vulnerability in the ecosystem is malicious signature requests, which lead unsuspecting users to authorize transactions that compromise their assets. This can happen by tricking people into signing something that allows a nefarious actor to transfer a users‚Äô assets.

To address this critical safety issue, MetaMask has introduced Signature Insight Snaps, a new category of security tools built by third-party developers. These Snaps empower users with greater transparency and control over signature requests, helping to identify and avoid potential threats.

Signature Insight Snaps integrate seamlessly with MetaMask. These tools work by analyzing the contents of requests, giving users insights into the signature‚Äôs purpose and potential risks. Leveraging knowledge from Signature Insight Snaps allows users to make more informed decisions, reducing the likelihood of falling victim to phishing attempts, unauthorized access, or other malicious activities. The added layer of security reinforces users' trust, and also fosters a safer environment for web3 interactions.

Discover our first Signature Insights Snaps

Kleros Scout is the first Snap to support Signature Insights. It decodes the content of signature requests, and identifies the addresses of any contracts you may be authorizing in the signature via Kleros‚Äôs decentralized token curated registries. It can then warn you if the contract you are interacting with is malicious.

Above, the Kleros Scout insight is displayed in the new signature request design. The insight shows that the contract being authorized by this signature request is the official Seaport 1.6 contract for NFT trading deployed by OpenSea.

ZyFi Paymaster Insights is our second Signature Insight Snap to launch. It improves the readability of signing transactions in the zkSync ecosystem, especially for paymaster-related transactions using txType 113. ZyFi Paymaster Insights adds helpful information about the ‚Äúfrom‚Äù and ‚Äúto‚Äù addresses for these paymaster-related transactions. Additionally, it provides extra information related to the paymaster, such as the address, type, gas fee token address, and gas fee token amount. This gives users more clarity on what they‚Äôre signing, helping them to avoid potentially malicious signatures.

Above, the ZyFi Paymaster Insight shows the from address, to address, and the paymaster type of the signature request on zkSync.

Install Kleros Scout Snap and ZyFi Paymaster Insights from the MetaMask Snaps Directory in MetaMask Extension 12.4.2 or later.

Build your own

Visit the MetaMask Developer Documentation to learn how you can build your own Signature Insight Snaps, and sign-up for our Builder Engagement Program so we can support you on your developer journey.

In the future, Signature Insights Snaps will be able to hook into alerts in signature requests. MetaMask will also offer more types of insights including information about origin URL of any request.

Head to the MetaMask Snaps Directory to discover security Snaps that will keep you safe in your web3 journey.

nodes.metaDescription: Explore MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps, which help to safeguard web3 users from malicious signature requests.

nodes.title: How to buy crypto
nodes.subtitle: Go from cash to crypto. All in one place.

image.title: How to buy crypto
image.description: Explore the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Wondering how to buy crypto, but not sure where to start? You‚Äôve come to the right place. Buying crypto with MetaMask is swift, seamless, and safe. You can use methods like a credit card, debit card, bank account, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or PayPal. No need for centralized exchanges. We‚Äôve cut out all of the unnecessary steps ‚Äî saving you time, and money on excess fees too.

Below, we'll give you an overview of how we make MetaMask wallet powerful, secure, and configurable when you buy cryptocurrencies. Then, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you exactly how to buy crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! ü¶ä

How MetaMask empowers you

  • Buy crypto straight into your MetaMask wallet.
  • Choose the best quote from our industry-leading aggregator.
  • Avoid centralized exchanges, extra steps, and additional costs.
  • Use MetaMask wallet in 188 countries with over 80 currencies available.
  • Select from hundreds of your favorite tokens across 15+ networks including: Ethereum, Linea, Optimism, BNB Chain, Polygon, zkSync, Base, Arbitrum, and Avalanche.
  • Go from cash to crypto back to cash. All in one place.

How MetaMask keeps you secure

  • Get 24/7 help whenever you need it from our expert customer service team.
  • We only work with trusted providers, ensuring that they comply with applicable regulations and are legitimate, responsible parties.
  • Preserving your privacy is paramount: MetaMask does not store ‚Äî nor do we have access to ‚Äî any personal information you provide when buying or selling crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.
  • Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.

How MetaMask gives you choice

  • Choose your preferred way to buy crypto including: debit card, credit card, bank transfer, instant ACH, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Ideal, SEPA bank transfers, and alternative local payment methods. These are subject to availability based on your region.
  • Select your preferred quote and provider.
  • Buy crypto using MetaMask Extension on desktop or the MetaMask app on mobile.

Buy crypto with MetaMask Extension

Clicking the Buy & Sell button on the MetaMask extension will redirect you to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto.
  2. Click Buy.
  3. Select your region, and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Select the crypto token, and network that you want to buy on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  5. Enter the amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH Example: $100 of ETH.
  6. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  7. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers.
  8. You'll be securely redirected to the provider's website to complete the purchase, and funds will be deposited into your MetaMask wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

Buy crypto with MetaMask app

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Buy.
  4. Select your region and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Select the crypto token, and network that you want to buy on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  7. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers.
  9. Complete the transaction on the provider‚Äôs portal, and link your desired payment method.
  10. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and confirm the transaction to get crypto in your wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

Ready to get started? If you‚Äôre on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you‚Äôre on mobile, download MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Head to MetaMask Support to speak with our team of experts around-the-clock.

nodes.metaDescription: Explore the ways to buy crypto directly using your debit card, credit card, PayPal, and bank account with MetaMask wallet.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
